    ##State Frequenies

    \[Q_{JC69} = \begin{pmatrix} {*} & \frac{1}{3} & \frac{1}{3} & \frac{1}{3} \\ \frac{1}{3} & {*} & \frac{1}{3} & \frac{1}{3} \\ \frac{1}{3} & \frac{1}{3} & {*} & \frac{1}{3} \\ \frac{1}{3} & \frac{1}{3} & \frac{1}{3} & {*} \end{pmatrix} \mbox{ ,}\]

    State Frequenies

    \[Q = \begin{pmatrix} -(k-1)\mu & \mu & \mu & \mu \\ \mu & -(k-1)\mu & \mu & \mu \\ \mu & \mu & -(k-1)\mu & \mu \\ \mu & \mu & \mu & -(k-1)\mu \\ \end{pmatrix} \mbox{ ,}\]

    Pr(01) = Rate at which we expect 0->1 * probability of 0

    State Frequenies

    \[Q = \begin{pmatrix} -(k-1)\mu & \mu\pi & \mu\pi & \mu\pi \\ \mu\pi_{1} & -(k-1)\mu & \mu\pi_{1} & \mu\pi_{1} \\ \mu\pi_{2} & \mu\pi_{2} & -(k-1)\mu & \mu\pi_{2} \\ \mu_{3} & \mu\pi_{3} & \mu_{3} & -(k-1)\mu \\ \end{pmatrix} \mbox{ ,}\]

    Pr(01) = Rate at which we expect 0->1 * probability of 0
    Pr(01) = .75 * .5
    Pr(01) = 0.375

    A Prior On State Frequenies

    But … maybe every character in the dataset does not have the same equilibrium character frequency
